front.title: Changing the Registration Policy for the NETCONF Capability URNs Registry

abstract.t: The registration policy for the Network Configuration Protocol (NETCONF) Capability URNs registry, set up by RFC 6241, has turned out to be unnecessarily strict. This document changes that registration policy to "IETF Review", allowing registrations from certain well reviewed Experimental RFCs, in addition to Standards Track RFCs.
